description: Sin descripción

name: Dance Dance Revolution A20
description: Dance Dance Revolution A20 (pronounced Ace Two Oh) is a music video game, the 16th installment of the Dance Dance Revolution series, and the sequel to Dance Dance Revolution A. The game was released on new, golden cabinets on March 20, 2019 in Japan. A software upgrade for older cabinets for Japan and Asia was released on July 24, 2019, with Korea receiving a localized release on August 1, 2019, and North America on September 24, 2019. A location test in Europe began on October 7, 2019, and ended on March 16, 2020. Dance Dance Revolution A20 Plus is an update that adds 14 new songs, available on July 1, 2020 for Japanese 20th Anniversary cabinets.

name: Merge Chicken
description:
Collect all the Super Chickens, merge to collect, discover and evolve to maximize your idle profit!

Run, Chicken, Run! Charge the eco power jet and double your earnings.

name: Blaster Master Zero 2
description: The side-scrolling/top-down hybrid action adventure gameplay returns with a brand new sequel to Blaster Master Zero!

name: Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2: Lite Version

• The first 5 episodes of the Story Mode

• All contents of the Hero Colosseum

DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 gives players the ultimate DRAGON BALL gaming experience! Develop your own warrior, create the perfect avatar, train to learn new skills & help fight new enemies to restore the original story of the DRAGON BALL series. Join 300 players from around the world in the new hub city of Conton & fight with or against them.

name: Cubicity: Slide puzzle

description: Four arcade games that pit the player against swarms of enemies inside a deadly matrix system that is programmed to destroy you.

name: Dracologic
description: A retro visualized action puzzler where you fight various monsters by connecting magical orbs to create devastating patterns.

name: ShooterSpheres
description: A fanatastic , fun action shooter game , with environmental and other puzzles , collectibles and good sized levels. With weapons , melee , and stealth. Creative handcrafted level designs , with a modern , yet old school feel.

name: UFOGen

Fight in the universe, on the surface of the planets and also in the wormhole. Do not forget to save the other pilots of the destroyed aircraft and get extra power as a bonus.

name: Zero One
description: Zero One - This is a text adventure game of Full-Voice, which uses various branch options to complete four different endings. Is it salvation or destruction that awaits the hero at last? That's a question.

name: Long Sky
description: "Long Sky" is a small arcade flight avoidance game that can switch the first person perspective. It has the characteristics of fast, easy, tight, repeatable play, and has the elements of collection and challenge.

description: Mort & Phil, created by Ibáñez, return to the charge in the world of the video game of the hand of spanish Alcachofa Soft. Three games in one is offers "La Banda del Corvino".

description: As you travel to find a new home for a near extinct species you reach Alpha Centauri. A safe haven from the zemulons a fierce warrior species but as you arrive to take this home as your own you the native population protect themselves from an invasion of there home world.

name: Super Kickers League
description:
The best arcade experience and football fantasy are waiting for you in Super Kickers League. There are no referees, there are no rules, everything is allowed, the only aim is to score more goals than your rival!

Play alone or with friends, form a team of captains and combine different skills to win matches, competitions and to unlock different game modes. Fun and goals are guaranteed in Super Kickers League!

name: Monovert DX
description: Monovert is a 2d puzzle platformer. You play as a square who has an ability to invert the level.

name: Steins;Gate: Divergencies Assort
description: Steins;Gate: Divergencies Assort includes three Steins;Gate series in one collection: Steins;Gate 0, Steins;Gate: Hiyoku Renri no Darling, and Steins;Gate Senkei Kousoku no Phenogram.

name: Crossroads: Lucky Edition
description: Crossroads is a roguelike RPG dungeon crawler stylized as a trading card game. Create your hero and go to the adventures to gain levels, loot new gear, learn different spells and finally complete your quest!

name: Super Robot Taisen T
description: Super Robot Taisen T is a simulation RPG with various robots crossing-over from different works to fight against common enemies.

name: Dead or Alive Xtreme 3: Scarlet
description: Dead or Alive Xtreme 3: Scarlet is a vacation-themed sports title with mini-games and its well-known fighting game characters featured in a variety of swimsuits.

name: Atelier Lulua: The Scion of Arland
description:
A continuation of the Arland Trilogy, which has recently been remastered for PS4 and Nintendo Switch.

The main character, Lulua, is the daughter of Rorona from the first game and the game will feature systems from recent Atelier games including the Mysterious trilogy.

name: Chocobo's Mystery Dungeon Every Buddy!
description:
"Chocobos don't just kick, and aren't just cute!

Take one step forward and change the world in this spectacular return to 2007’s FINAL FANTASY FABLES: Chocobo's Dungeon, specially designed for new gaming systems.

The rules to this mysterious dungeon are simple… every time you enter, the world around you changes shape, but it only moves whenever Chocobo moves, whether Chocobo walks, kicks, or uses an item.

Fight monsters alongside your buddies and adventure through countless dungeons, all whilst enjoying a deep and engaging story, it even includes 2-player co-op play!"

name: Tokyo Chronos
description: Tokyo Chronos is a VR game that has multiple-choice decision points as well as more than one ending. It has a long story you've never experienced before with VR. The game takes place in Shibuya, Tokyo, which has only eight people, including you, the protagonist, Kyosuke Sakurai. Why are they there?

name: Mundus: Impossible Universe
description:
We invite you to join the Great Shaman in a quest to explore the Impossible Universe. You will find dozens of unique worlds with their own rewards… and dangers. Face challenging Match-3 puzzles and meet strange denizens of fantastic planets. This is our best game we have ever crafted. Satisfaction is guaranteed!

Features:
- Unique puzzles on square and hexagonal fields!
- Challenging gameplay!
- Relaxing music and sound effects!

name: Final Assault
description: Final Assault is an action packed, WWII themed RTS that capitalizes on the power of VR. Command massive ground battles as the skies erupt in dynamic dog fights. Combat requires quick thinking and fast reflexes. Fight the battle, win the war!

name: Heathen Engineering's Terran
description:
Set in the distant future, man has evolved beyond flesh and bone and is now one with the machine.

Your journey starts as a young Terran pilot, taking your first steps into the galaxy. Build and fly massive capital class warships in real time combat, create factions, corporations and more.

name: MLB 9 Innings 19
description:
4.0.0
- Club Battle Improvement & Official Opening
- New Pick'em Content
- 2019 season schedule implemented
- Special Training Lv. 6 effect changed
- New Player Book Board
- Each team's Ballpark Improvements

name: Party Hard 2: Alien Butt Form
description: Something has been very wrong with parties in the city of Aho Bay recently. Who really controlled Party Hard Killer? Why it took so long for the police to catch him? Where are those tentacles grown from, for Christ’s sake? Find out in this brand new DLC, fueled by booze and hilarity.

name: Who wants to strip this babe?: Hentai Teacher
description: The combination of the well-known TV show with the best genre of games on earth. Undress a girl using your knowledge :)

name: The Antaresian Spacepond
description: This is a map made for antares031's birthday, which was on the 19th.

name: 8 Ball Legend: Online Pool
description: 8 Ball Legend is the best and most realistic billiards legend pool game on mobile phones. Play billiards online with people in over the world. Can you get to the top of the leaderboard?

name: LEGO DC Super-Villains: Batman - The Animated Series Level Pack
description: A character pack for LEGO DC Super-Villains, introducing characters from Batman: The Animated Series such as Batman, Two-Face, Captain Clown, Harley Quinn, Joker, The Phantasm, Man-Bat, and Mad Hatter.

name: Modern Ops
description: Quality mobile FPS experience, with a very active, and competitive community. Join a clan, compete for cups, and respect... Level up, and upgrade your skills and gear along the road to glory!!

name: Pinball FX3: Williams Pinball - Volume 3
description: This stunning collection of three authentic Bally tables includes THEATRE OF MAGIC, SAFE CRACKER, and THE CHAMPION PUB. All are available in a classic and a remastered form with a host of new features.

name: 100% Orange Juice: Iru & Mira Character Pack
description: This extra character pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 new playable characters - the gun expert Iru and the ninja-esque Mira. The new characters come fully voiced!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - P-51H Mustang
description: The aircraft has been detailed inside and out down to the last rivet and features smooth 3D gauge technology, droppable external fuel tanks, working 3D collimating gun sight and authentically reproduced Merlin engine sounds.

name: Apex Legends: Season 1
description: The hunt is on. Welcome to the Wild Frontier.

name: Dead by Daylight: Demise of the Faithful Chapter
description: Demise of the Faithful is a brand-new Chapter for Dead by Daylight, which includes a new Killer, a Survivor and a Map. Purchasing the Demise of the Faithful DLC will unlock its new Killer, new Survivor, and an exclusive item for the new survivor.

name: American Ninja Warrior: Challenge
description:
Are you the next America Ninja Warrior? 
Begin your quest to achieve Total Victory with the action-packed obstacle course competition game, American Ninja Warrior Challenge! Do you have the strength and endurance to jump, swing, and sprint your way to hitting the buzzer at the end? Race against the clock with your friends and family while testing your skills in couch multi-player or take on the challenging career mode. Those who successfully complete the city courses move on to the finals will face a stunning four-stage course modeled after the famed Mt. Midoriyama in Japan. Enjoy all the thrills and spills to become the next American Ninja Warrior! 
Features 
 
• Take on classic obstacles such as the Salmon Ladder, Warped Wall, Log Grip and more! 
• Build your own custom course and have your own personalized Ninja race through it 
• In-game commentary voiced by the TV show hosts Matt Iseman and Akbar Gbajabiamila 
• Offline multi-player & online leaderboards

name: Dirt Rally Driver HD
description:
Dirt Rally Driver HD, the successful mobile game is now available in PC for free!

In Dirt Rally Driver HD, you take on challenging tracks from around the world. Drift past various bends and whizz through your competitors. Be dazzled by realistic car effects from different scenes ranging from dark terrains to snowy tracks. As you approach the finishing line, unleash your last minute nitro and secure your championship title. Are you ready for a race of your life?

name: Destruction
description: Destruction is a game that destroys enemies up to 25 stages. A variety of powerful enemies will attack you. Don't let your guard down and use three modes and a variety of skills to destroy your enemies.

name: Dust on Wheels
description: Who comes first to the finish in this long grueling dusty race depends on you.

name: Human Sacrifice
description: When I woke up I was at a ceremonial place. Several deaths await you ahead of your choice to survive. Can you unravel this ceremony's mystery and survive?

name: SpaceBullet
description: In this game , you need to control a spaceship to defeat your enemy and get your best points .There are also kinds of bullets appear in your game , if you get a tool,you can change your bullet.Just like the way to change bullets, you need to get a card tool so as to control cards to choose the fate of your spaceship.

name: The Trials of Olympus III: King of the World
description: Angelo's thrilling story comes to an end in this epic conclusion to the "Trials of Olympus" trilogy. Play 100 challenging match-3 levels, use 32 upgrades to help you beat the designing Xerxes and save Greece!

name: Fallout 76: Wild Appalachia
description: A mythical beast, a lost generation of scouts, and the strongest brew this side of the wasteland. Welcome to Wild Appalachia – a series of free and all-new quests, features, events, crafting systems and more starting today in Fallout 76.

name: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock: Sin and Sacrifice
description:
Lucinda Cain, the Agathon sisters and all the other protagonists of Battlestar Galactica Deadlock will need to face their greatest threat yet: Lachesis, the powerful IL-series commander, has awakened and nothing will be the same.

Battlestar Galactica Deadlock is back with a new expansion! In Sin and Sacrifice, the epic story of Deadlock continues, and brings with it an exciting conclusion to the Season One storyline.

name: Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom - Tale of a Timeless Tome
description: The starting point of this adventure is a mysterious appearance in a dream. People staying at the Goldpond Inn claim to be visited by an enigmatic rabbit in their sleep. Upon hearing this rumor, Evan and his friends decide to stay at the hotel to investigate and unveil the mystery. They enter a dream together, step into a strange house and meet the Conductor, a rabbit in a tuxedo and a top hat. To those who played the original game, Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch, both the house and the Conductor will be familiar. The Conductor’s role in this story, however, remains to be discovered!

name: Disgaea RPG
description:
A departure from the grid-based tactics gameplay of the main series, the game uses teams of 5 characters, from throughout the series, to fight waves of enemies in turn-based battles.
Characters can have star ratings from 2 to 6, that have various level caps with the end goal of a 6 star character being upgraded to level 9999.
The game is region locked in Japan.

Originally released in March 2019 with bugs and server issues, the game was taken offline to work on fixes and improve the game. it was re-launched in November 2019.

name: Night Crisis
description: Night Crisis is based upon a multiplayer co-op experience. The game will focus on a linear PvE-experience, There will be multiple factions of enemies to take down, which may have units on the ground, in the air and on sea.

name: Super Crome: Bullet Purgatory
description: In the dark depths of space, an unknown threat called Purgatory has begun to consume colonies throughout the cosmos. As solar systems are engulfed by this mysterious force, the fate of civilization is at stake.

name: Cannon Fire
description: Cannon fire is a game all about blowing your friends' ship to pieces, either in multiplayer or Split-Screen mode for the best experience.

name: Peasant Knight
description: Peasant Knight is a challenging puzzle-platformer that you can play with only two keys: jump and stop. All the while you're relentlessly dashing forward into traps, enemies, and hazards.

name: Nameko
description:
After an attack on Nameko from a superior species, one of the humans that was
kidnapped is not going in that easily.

Play with Ko a human kidnapped by an alien species, trying to survive in a new hostile environment. Use Ko’s melee and ranged weapons, alongside a variety of unlockable abilities to avoid the destruction of mankind.

name: Black Survival
description: Black Survival is a Real-Time Survival Game, where you must survive by any means out of 10 competitors in a deserted island. Make split-second decisions with a single click! Immerse yourself in the fierce battle for survival; you do not have a second to spare! Search, Craft, Attack, and Run!

name: Triangle Cross
description: Triangle/cross is a mobile BL novel game.

name: Fortnite: The Laguna Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Pocket Academy Zero
description:
Congratulations on your enrollment!
Help your students succeed and make your school famous!

name: We Have a Frog Problem
description: A circular toy with frogs, physics, and jokes

name: After Solitary
description: The story of a man's life after solitary confinement.

name: Call Me Emperor
description: Experience life in the mysterious Eastern Empire, become the most powerful and famous Emperor across the entire Chinese dynasty. Surround yourself with enticing beauties across the globe and experience more oriental features and fun in this game. The beginning of a new era has just begun! Join millions of players worldwide and fight epic battles. build the most powerful dynasty of all time and lead your empire to the golden age!

name: Touhou Makuka Sai: Fantastic Danmaku Festival Part II

name: Burd.

This edition includes the following:

name: Under the Fallen Snow
description:
What lies under the fallen snow? 
 
Find upgrades and use them to explore the mysterious snow caves beneath the mountain. Discover what is causing the powerful earthquakes in your world.

name: Meccha Zombies
description: Refreshingly knock out massive impending zombies, in this new top-down shooter! Clean up zombies and earn gold to boost up your skill and ability, and aim for 100% area capture!

name: Two Point Hospital: Pebberley Island
description:
Part-time explorer and notorious germaphobe, Wiggy Silverbottom, is on a quest to discover the secrets of eternal life. As a hospital administrator with a flair for the unconventional, Wiggy needs your help to unlock this most majestic of bounties.

Expand your medical frontiers. Experience new sights. Yearn to discover the greatest secret of all.

Includes three new hospitals, a wide variety of new illnesses and an array of tropical paraphernalia to place in your spectacular hospitals (if you do say so yourself!)

name: Faux
description: Play as Faux, the artificial human and pass the difficult challenges that lie ahead.

description: Space shooter with multiple game modes. Destroy enemies, get experience and increase your level.

name: Dark Gnome
description: Retro gaming at its best! Join the cantankerous pixel art gnomes as they raid their neighbors in round-based combat. Chock-full of dark humor and loads of quirky characters, this RPG won‘t let you go. To battle! Play now!

name: Bleeding Edge VR
description: Experience the movie-like escaping plot with chasing, shooting, and thrilling! The game brings player a short but satisfying VR experience by reproducing the process of a highly-intense chasing plot with the highest quality of game graphic that you’ve ever seen so far in VR!

name: 100 Euro
description: The Magic Wallet once again take his quest in search for untold wealth, to fulfill the long-held dream of its owner. Go to parallel worlds to collect hundreds of euros, and make the old lady happy!

name: Spellcasting Collection
description: Steve Meretzky's trilogy of magic-themed collegiate text adventures-with-graphics for Legend. The sometimes-smutty but never-beyond-softcore stories put the player in the shoes of one Ernie Eaglebeak, a wizard-in-training at at Sorcerer University.

name: Escape from the tomb tower
description: Escape from the crypt tower, where spent hundreds of years. Dark atmosphere and riddles.

name: Riot Street
description: Riot Street is a tactical driven team shooter dedicated to close quarters combat on urbanized terrain.

name: In Darkness
description: In Darkness will test your ability to decipher secret codes and to discover patterns that are essential to progress along the complex dungeons.

name: The Deepest House
description: The Deepest House is a sleek 'n' squishy, mostly minimal, top-down 3D roguelike action game. Use your blade, bullets, and whatever you can dig up in the dungeon to reach the end of it. But don't let the squishy silhouettes of your foes fool you. Cocky house-divers can easily be overwhelmed if they charge-in headfirst into a room.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Legend of Z RPG
description: A fan-made Dragon Ball Z RPG Maker 2003 fan game that takes place from Saiyan-Buu Saga with some 'GT' and 'Super' content afterward.

name: Rabbit's Quest
description: Rabbit's Quest is a metroidvania with a retro aesthetic.

name: Death World
description: A dark exploration game.

name: Shmup Moments
description: Shmup Moments is a shoot-'em-up game that's easy to pick up and play. With arcade-like gameplay, slick controls and sound, hot beats and lighting, and a classic bullet hell ambience, it's the perfect game to chill out with when you need a break from AAA titles, or to meditate with before going to bed.

name: Destiny Hunter
description: Destiny Hunter is a story based RPG game in which you can control two characters, a female warrior and a female Archer. The story is about searching a better place to live and of course find your Destiny. You need to pass through cold places and reach into a better place to finish the game.

name: Random of Wars
description: Random of wars is a mmofps. You live the life of a soldier in broad outline. Training, simulation & fight entirely in multiplayer. This is Classic fps but more fun environnement.

name: Movie Challenge
description: Connect actors and films through their careers and cast members in under 2 minutes!

name: Dinosaurily
description: Sin descripción

name: Bad 2 Bad: Extinction
description: Bad 2 Bad: Extinction is a simple & fun action mobile game

name: ThirdMiracle
description:
This game is a classic package style.
Stories of rebels against Empire tyranny.
Charming little girl characters and beautiful stories.

name: Colors of Your World
description: A platforming adventure about the colors of life.

name: #Drive
description: #Drive is an endless driving video game inspired by road and action movies from the 70s and 80s. As simple as possible, allowing the player to pick a car, pick the place and just hit the road. Just be aware not to hit anything else. No matter where we drive, no matter what we drive or how fast we drive. We simply chose to drive.

name: Space Mining Clicker
description: Become the Director, manage your mining facility and try to make profit when surviving to the geopolitical storm opposing the two biggest factions.

name: Tricky Cat
description: Help this cute cat jumping on tiles but don't fall down in this platformer.

name: Massive Air Combat
description: Over 100 air fighters and 3D dogfight!! You can enjoy large-scaled aerial dogfight.

name: Late Night 1320
description: Experience a blast to the past of old school drag racing in its purest form. Find a variety of classic cars, trucks, and odd vehicles from the junkyard and rescue them from their inevitable demise. Once you've restored and fixed your junker, take it to the backroads and compete against a variety of racers to earn their respect. Work your way up the chain and gain rep with the local crowd. Discover new drag spots to further work your way up the chain and continue upgrading your car. Compete at the drag strip for the ultimate test against sponsored racers and become the Late Night king.

name: Thalu: Dreamtime is Now
description: Thalu: Dreamtime is Now is a uniquely Indigenous Australian experience that showcases the powerful storytelling of the Ngarluma people of Western Australia.

name: War Theatre
description: War has come to Kasalli. As endless conflict rages, seven warriors discover an ancient power that promises mastery over any battlefield. War Theatre expands classic turn-based strategy gameplay with RPG elements. Choose your hero and take to battle in single-player campaigns set in a continent ravaged by ceaseless war. Complete quests to earn perks and unlock deeper customization options to refine your strategy and dominate opponents. Directed by Luc Bernard

name: Ymir
description: Ymir is a 4X multiplayer strategy game combined with a city builder where each player develops a civilization of pigmen starting at the stone age.

name: The Voice of Germany: Das offizielle Videospiel!
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Prism
description: The Sprixie princess has been trapped in one of the painting worlds! It is now up to Mario to rescue her by collecting the power stars to restore color to the paintings in this 3D platformer!

name: The Elementalists 2
description: The Elementalists, Book 2 is the second and final book of the The Elementalists series. It succeeds its first book, The Elementalists, Book 1.

name: Flow Fit
description:
Flow Fit is a little bit crossword, a little bit jigsaw puzzle, and a ton of fun!
Fit blocks, make words! Choose from tons of themed puzzles on your favorite topics and exercise your brain with new challenges.

Flow Fit has more than 1000 themed word puzzles designed by New York Times published puzzle designers. With tons of different categories, board designs, and a variety of difficulty levels, Flow Fit provides hours of fun whether you’re a logic puzzle novice or a crossword genius!

name: Coloring Pixels: Animals Pack
description: Unlocks the Animals themed book for Coloring Pixels. Includes 20 new animal themed levels to complete! Expect images of animals from all walks of life, everything from eagles and butterflies to snails and cats.

name: Nothing!
description: What do you play? I play nothing!

name: Dead or Alive 6: Bayman
description: Download this to use Bayman in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game. (This content may be offered for free for a limited period of time.)

description: Download this to use Hayate in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game. (This content may be offered for free for a limited period of time.)

description: Download this to use Helena in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game. (This content may be offered for free for a limited period of time.)

description: Download this to use Eliot in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game. (This content may be offered for free for a limited period of time.)

description: Download this to use Mila in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game. (This content may be offered for free for a limited period of time.)

description: Download this to use Jann Lee in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game. (This content may be offered for free for a limited period of time.)

name: Dead or Alive 6: Tina
description: Download this to use Tina in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game. (This content may be offered for free for a limited period of time.)

name: One Piece: World Seeker Episode Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Ztar Attack Rebooted
description: SM64 Ztar Attack Rebooted is a rom hack made by TheGael95 and Aglab2, it is a remake of Super Mario 64 1.5 Ztar Attack! featuring 170 Ztars, reworked smaller levels and new gimmicks.

name: Distant Memoraĵo
description:
Distant Memoraĵo is a sequel to "The Expression Amrilato"

This is the story, pure and sometimes frustrating, of two girls intertwined through their fumbling efforts to communicate. Learn a new language and the universal emotions behind our words!

name: Half-Life: Anti-Climax
description: Half-Life: Anti-Climax is my take on the "battle you have no chance of winning" the G-Man offers you once you decline his job offer at the end of the Half-Life campaign. Is there truly no chance to win or can you lead Gordon to victory and freedom?

name: Dungeons & Aliens
description: Dungeons & Aliens

name: In Game
description: We manage our imprisoned character in the video game.In order to save our trapped character in the game, we have to move through each other's difficult platforms and get the character to the exit door.

name: Quar: Infernal Machines
description: Quar: Infernal Machines is the 1st ever turn-based-strategy game available for the PlayStation VR, set in the grimmsical world of Alwyd, based on the Table Top Game system "This Quar's War".

name: Icesolation
description: Icesolation is a highly challenging two-player local co-operative puzzle and exploration game for VR. A pair of researchers were investigating an old top-secret Soviet expedition deep in Siberia, when one of them got trapped inside a mysterious mine. They must now work together to find a way back outside.

name: Newt's Voyage
description: Join Newt Isaacson, explorer extraordinaire, as he travels from moon to moon in the solar system collecting samples of each one's surface.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!
description: The game's system is somewhere between air combat and naval warfare. In this game the player controls fighters to destroy the enemy's fleet. Cross the line of fire and shot down one enemy after another, fighter, striker, bomber, gunship, battleship and airship.

name: Data mining 7
description: Data mining 7 - casual colorful minimalist puzzle in which you have to collect all the files that are not corrupted to exit the closed circle.

name: Defection
description: Defection is a third-person multiplayer shooter with hand-drawn styling.

name: Tian Huo
description: it's a puzzle gameIt's a time-travel story You stumble across the ancient world and are drawn into a strange life experience. Solving the mystery is the key to everything.Chinese wind? Martial arts? Little sister? All of them, and all of them are cute.First shelves, 30% off, welcome.

name: Current
description: Current is a puzzle game for a couple of hours, where you have to bring all the platforms one level.

name: Stoppa!
description: Stop time and manipulate objects around you to reach the goal line!

name: De'Vine: Card Game
description: As enchantments that bind powerful creatures to cards begin to corrode... Hell is breaking loose! Will you be clever enough to build a strong set of cards to defeat this evil? Over 300 unique CARDS to collect! Fast paced CARD BATTLE system!

name: Cherry Creek
description:
Cherry Creek is a tile-turning puzzle game, set in a picturesque natural environment. The aim is to rotate the river tiles to take water from the fountain to all the cherry trees. Click the tiles to rotate them until the puzzle is complete, and lock tiles to help you finish the harder levels.

The puzzles offer something for all abilities, so enjoy a coffee break by playing a few simple levels, or set yourself a real challenge on the hardest difficulties. Try to beat your best scores, or just relax and enjoy the atmosphere.

name: vApe Escape
description: vApe Escape is a point-and-click adventure in a science fiction comedy setting. The player takes control of an innocent ape who must escape the sad destiny of becoming a vape dispenser machine for the wealthy hipsters of the universe.

name: Let's Worm
description: Let's Worm is in a league of its own. You can even lose during the tutorial! It's casual but hardcore. A cutscene-based story where the controls are simple, but the gameplay complex.

name: Full Pitch
description: Avoid disaster. Pass check points. Believe in yourself.

name: Virtual Battlegrounds
description: Virtual Battlegrounds is the ultimate Battle Royale being built from the ground up for virtual reality. Battle to become the last man standing on this apocalyptic war-crazed island through tactical gun-play, an epic map, and physical based controls for skydiving, climbing, shooting, ziplining, and driving.

name: Tales of Nebezem RPG: Red Peril
description: Magical RPG in a rich colorful world, with tactical battles and an immersive story

name: Successor of the Moon
description: A classic 2D side-scrolling action (Metroidvania) game. The young priestess embarks on a journey to solve the monsters' suspicious movements in Parthenope. Seek the help of your peers and elves, Acquire a variety of abilities, and reach the end to discover the truth.

name: Monster Hunting... For Love!
description: Sit down and have a talk with a variety of monsters that are only looking to have a good time. Play your cards right, and maybe you'll even go home with them. Who knows what will happen after that?

name: Book of Eos
description: Take a look into the hearts of monsters in an epic adventure inspired by classic console RPGs.

name: Qubes
description: Qubes is an online 1v1 game where fast thinking, speed and focus are at the core of the gameplay experience. Challenge a friend or a random player in a match with a set of randomly generated rules, and try to color the majority of the map with the help of different powerups!

name: The Sea of TianGang XinSu
description: “The sea of TianGang XinSu” is an individually developed independent space game. The story takes place after the war between the earth and the robot world. The earth was reduced to the bargaining chip of the robots and was locked at a place of black holes. The core aim of this pre-launched version is to release the earth from the robots.

name: Legend of Girl Friend and GDC
description: Sin descripción

name: Sakura no Mori Dreamers 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Fullvoice Reborn
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Downfall
description: An overdose of reality can have dire consequences… Descend down the rabbit hole and embrace your Downfall in a trippy, brutal and stylized adventure.

name: Agent 9
description: Experience the action-packed life of Agent 9 and bring an end to the world's most dangerous villains. Explore vibrant vistas and enemy-packed enclaves by sneaking or shooting your way to success. Saving the world has never been so fun!

name: Medieval Towns
description: A multiplayer game in medieval setting about survival, politics, building of towns and conquests. Try to survive in wild nature, gather resources, create or join clan, build town and fight for glory or resources!

name: Queen's Blade: White Triangle
description:
A mobile game released on Bandai Namco's enza platform which allows the game to be played through any compatible web browser on PC or Mobile.

The game is based on Queen's Blade: Unlimted, an OVA reboot of the original show.
The game's website describes it as an armor break RPG, characters clothing/armor is damaged as they are injured in battle, with turn-based combat and it also has some card-based mechanics.

name: Halzae: Heroes of Divinity
description: Halzae: Heroes of Divinity is a dynamic and competitive multiplayer online Arena Brawler, in which 2 to 10 players fight in free-for-all or in team. Each player chooses his Hero, his spells, and jumps into battle. Pick up Halzae's essence in the arenas to fire up your spells, and fulfill the objectives.

name: Fenimore Fillmore: 3 Skulls of the Toltecs
description: 3 Skulls of the Toltecs was one of the last classic point & click adventure release in 1996, now you can play it again in this wonderful remastered version with enhanced graphics up to 4k.

name: Double
description: Double is a psychological thriller in a 50’s Cuban Revolution setting. Explore the hidden places of your mind on the border of two worlds: reality and nightmares.

name: Korvux
description:
Welcome to the Korvux kingdom. A fantasy world that is controlled by the Korvux clan.
Today is the day where you apply for a membership, but not everything turns out as you hoped.

name: DragonCrash
description: DragonCrash is a 3D Battle Arena Treasure game. Select between 5 different dragons and gather gems to power up while taking down your foes! After getting the required amount, defend and capture the zone!

name: Ancient Jewels 3: Cleopatra's Treasures
description: Sin descripción

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2
description: The Division 2 is an action-shooter RPG set in an open-world. Play in co-op and PvP modes that offer more variety in missions and challenges, new progression systems with unique twists and surprises, and fresh gaming innovations to engage players for years to come.

name: Wangan Warrior X
description: Wangan Warrior X is a modernized realistic take on street-racing games that were only available in cabinets at arcades. Players can customize and tune their car with a wide variety of options and parts.

name: Wolfpack
description: Wolfpack is a co-op U-boat simulation game.

name: Elephants and Snakes and Crocodiles
description: A Super Mario World romhack created by Morsel.

name: Digital Monster X
description: Digital Monster X is a brand new Digital Monster Virtual Pet which is focusing on X-Antibody Digimon. Several mechanics from the Digimon Pendulum X series also make a return, such as the XAI System.

name: Senpai Teaches Me Japanese
description: Do you know any Japanese? Based on textbook learning methods, at the end of this game you will know how to read Japanese characters, sentence structure, and 100+ words.

name: Yume no Radio
description: Yume no Radio is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Kakutsuki and explore her dream world. The goal is to explore and collect effects (which are some objects that glow lights). A minigame called Shiwake is accessible by interacting with the device next to the notebook.

name: A Link to the Past: ReLink
description:
Project ReLink: A Link To The Past, Layout & Logic Modification Hack.

ReLink is an expansive Romhack for ALTTP which modifies both Overworld areas and Dungeons to change the required items needed for progression through the game. While none of the locations you acquire unique items have changes, the places where you use them has. ReLink opens up much of the darkworld earlier, allowing players greater freedom in choosing where they want to go and when. All of these changes and edits to the game are meant to be used alongside the randomizer in the future.

name: West Game
description: A war game set in the Wild West. Build up your town, train troops, research, attack and defend against other towns, capture buildings for boosts, participate in events, grow stronger with your alliance, and more.

name: Pilgrimage
description: Discover and explore the deeper meanings of La Dispute's 2019 "Panorama" album by exploring abstract landscapes and finding accompanying lyrics.

name: Fire Pro Wrestling World: Fighting Road - 2017 NJPW Junior Heavyweight Championship
description: You never forgot the excitement you felt when your father showed you your first junior heavyweight match... Now you step into the NJPW dojo to realize your childhood dream of becoming the best junior heavyweight the world has ever seen!

name: My Lovely Daughter: The Inquisitor
description: A mysterious guest is coming to the Salach Village. The Inquisitor DLC includes new game mechanic, new story and gameplay adjustment for My Lovely Daughter.

name: Crossout: Horsemen of Apocalypse - War
description: This pack includes: unique armoured vehicle “War machine”; Weapon: epic crossbow “Phoenix”, rare course rocket “AT Wasp”, 2 pcs.; unique epic cabin “Echo”; “Twin wheels”, 6 pcs.; Engine “Hot red” of epic rarity; Structural parts of “War”; Unique character portrait “Victor Pyrrhus”; Rare decor “Furnace”, 2 pcs.; Exclusive sticker “Red horse”; Spray can with unique paint “Scorching sand”; Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55; 1500 in-game coins.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Kickstarter County
description: Based upon the famous Highland Valley route from the early days of Trainz, Kickstarter County has received a huge upgrade with new content, new track and new industries. This route is a tribute to all our Kickstarter Backers who helped make Trainz A New Era possible and includes a range of customized assets dedicated to our keenest...

name: Johnny Turbo's Arcade: Joe and Mac Returns
description: Joe & Mac return in this frantic and zany single-screen arcade action platformer. The local cave women have been kidnapped once again, so it's up to these stone-age superstars to rescue them. Grab your club and get ready to dish out serious prehistoric pain!

name: Last Mage Standing
description:
Play 100 Player Fantasy Battle Royale, Co-op Tower Defense and more game modes in this fast paced action RPG brawler.

Battle solo or team up with friends in a variety of PvE and PvP modes for quick three minute rounds. Collect and upgrade a roster of Guardians and pair them up with magical and mechanical abilities to rule the day.

name: Pixel Petz
description: Create, trade, and collect cute petz! Breed them, play with them, enter them in contests -- the possibilities are endless!

name: Hentai Crush
description: As a single man who desperately wants to have a girlfriend, you have been introduced to a lot of girls via matchmaking service. Let's seduce them and advance your relationship...

name: Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker - Special Episode
description: This DLC introduces eighteen new challenges, including five brand-new courses.

developers.name: Nintendo EAD Tokyo Software Development Group No.1

name: Smolsies
description: Meet Smolsies - the cutest squishy pom-pom creatures! Kids and toddlers, boys and girls will love their new virtual pets! Hatch surprise eggs and collect all the pet Smolsies! Watch baby Smolsies grow! Play, feed and clean up! Merge Smolsies and create new super cute squishy and fluffy animals! Watch your Smolsies chat and play with each other! By the way, Smolsies talk emoji!

name: Kemco RPG Selection Vol. 2
description:
Kemco RPG Selection Vol. 2 is a bundle of multiple games in the J-RPG genre.

Asdivine Hearts II - With a world on the verge of being frozen in ice, hearts unite once more in a sequel to the smash hit RPG series!

Revenant Dogma - Explore dynamic, constantly changing dungeons, take on many subquests and open up your path in a grand adventure!

Fernz Gate - Join forces with buddies and fight! Take advantage of the Secret House and dispatch buddies to collect items or place them on stands to gain special-effects. Grow parameter-increasing fruit, upgrade and customize weapons, take on variety of sub quests and enjoy plenty of content!

Alvastia Chronicles - Weapon upgrades, a battle arena, and quests are only the beginning of what is in store!

name: One Piece: World Seeker - Deluxe Edition
description: The ONE PIECE World Seeker Deluxe Edition includes the game and the Episode Pass, which contains 3 additional episode packs and bonus items.

name: Real Time Battle Shogi
description: Sin descripción

name: My Jurassic Farm 2018
description: You start with just a compsognathus, an empty field and a few pennies. You have to feed your dino, take care of it and improve its living conditions!

name: Twist & Match
description: Challenge your spatial visualization skills and make optimal moves to build combos!

name: Teddy The Wanderer: Mountain Hike
description: Teddy The Adventurer brings joy to every youngling, as well as brings educational value.

name: Alien Cruise
description: AlienCruise is an independent side scroller shooting game. Its background is set at the foreseeable future, when protagonist is facing a survival crisis due to deterioration of the Earth’s natural environment. At this point, some scientists detect the existence of other planets outside their own galaxy with other types of life on them, which are very likely to be suitable for human beings. They therefore trained a group of elite space astronauts to look for chances of extending life in the outer space and save their home. These well-trained space warriors need to drive spacecrafts to explore and find a planet suitable for human life. In the unknown space, unprecedented great challenges awaits them.

name: Apocryph: an old-school shooter
description: Apocryph is a FPS set in a brutal dark fantasy world. It takes it's roots in old-school fantasy shooters, so prepare for intense sword-and-sorcery FPS action amidst forgotten castles, evil shrines and decrepit dungeons! The world of Apocryph is a grim, violent place, harboring magic, dark rituals and dangers around every corner. Wherever you go you'll be facing unrelenting monsters, traps and locked passages, and can only depend on yourself and your equipment to survive the trials.

name: Anti Terrorist Rush 2
description: In Anti Terrorist Rush 2 you join a shootout to free captured military bases from the hands of terrorists. However you don't control the guy freeing the bases. Functionally the game is the same as the previous game in the serie. As you free more bases you unlock new weapons, which you can deploy during the battles. These weapons include trowing knifes, attack dogs, grenades, missiles and health packs. They can also be upgraded to increase their effectiveness. The player can also upgrade the equipment of his character.

name: Drag Star!
description: Get ready, honey! You're a contestant on Drag Star!, the reality TV drag competition. You better throw shade, serve looks, and slay each episode to become the next drag icon!

name: Pictopix: Mosaics
description: Sin descripción

name: National Park Girls
description: All Eve ever wanted was to protect and preserve the land, but after five years of being a ranger in Yosemite National Park, she’s just about ready to throw in the towel. However, things start to change when she meets three spritely girls who claim to represent the National Parks.

name: Street Fighter V: Type Arcade
description:
A Japanese arcade cabinet version of Street Fighter V with some changes.

The arcade version uses a different/separate ranking system than the PS4 and PC versions of the game and a Fighter ID can be used to access some costumes already purchased on the account.

name: Its Simple, Shoot
description: Its Simple, Shoot! Is a minimalist top down 2D wave shooter that has the player utilizing various weapons and abilities to overcome their foes.

name: iMemory
description: iMemory - This is a logical game designed to train the memory and attention of the player.

name: Asteroid Hideout
description: Similar to classic Asteroids you pilot a spaceship through an asteroid belt, but additionally fight waves of enemies. Every hit gives you some score and increases your score multiplier. Go for the highscore! Progress by unlocking more ships and applying upgrades and dive into higher difficulties!

name: Motorsport Manager for Nintendo Switch
description: In Motorsport Manager for Nintendo Switch, the console debut for the series, you will build, customize, and lead your very own high-performance Motorsport team through 9 tiers of racing action, across three car classes to become number one. Race to win in this immersive management strategy title where real-time racing decision making and forward planning are the key to victory.

name: Refight: The Last Warship
description: Each game will be attended by 30 people. Players need to search for and collect naval guns, armor, engines, ammunition, torpedoes, supplies, etc. in the vast ocean. After that, players need survive in the confrontation, avoid air strikes, snowstorm areas and stick to the end.

name: K.O.M.A
description: Get inside the character's mind!

name: Battle of the Boros
description: Battle of the Boros is an action adventure RPG set during a mysterious invasion and occupation of New York City.

name: Author Clicker
description: Select images and text from randomly provided content to create your own story or visual novel! No typing!

name: Sephirothic Stories
description: When the world tree begins to wane, what will become of the balance of the world? Discover the truth behind the world tree's waning power in a fantasy RPG! Navigate trap-filled dungeons using only your mind and wit to conquer challenging puzzles!

name: Elsword
description: Sin descripción

name: Machi Knights: Blood Bagos
description: Thwart the villain Kenos’ plans to resurrect Bagos, a gargantuan weapon from ancient times! Pilot the Machi Knights, giant weapons that make up the legacy of an ancient kingdom that fell to ruin, and take down enemies to surge forward in this new action RPG.

name: Reflections: Dreams and Reality
description: A visual novel about a girl who wishes to escape her fate and those who follow closely behind her.

name: Bullynoid
description: Bullynoid - This is a colorful breakout game in which you have to play for a bully! Beat the faces of passersby and onlookers! Take away their money! All of what sometimes you want to do in reality is now available in the game! Unlock new Freaky characters!

name: Twinship
description: This little cube is stuck in a parallel world divided between black and white! Help him finish the levels and leave this world!

name: Four-color Fantasy
description: X-rated Tile-matching  game are coming, enjoy it!

name: Stupid Cupid
description: Help Cupid #0201 get back in Venus’ good graces in this VR game! Use his bow and arrow to balance the natural order by helping animals mate, or in some cases, culling the overpopulation. Challenge your skills and accuracy in different locations and seasons.

name: Seek Girl
description: Seek Girl is a casual game where players use the left mouse button to click on the cartoon characters that pop up in the game to break the occlusion blocks they protect.

name: Hunger Apartment
description: This place is called HUNGER APARTMENT. Not only will it feed and clothe you, but it will also satisfy all your fantasies.

name: Ordo Et Chao: New World
description: Inspired by famed series like "The Settlers", "Battle for Middle-Earth", "Anno" and "Age of Empires", Ordo Et Chao is a solo-player strategy game combining elements of real time strategy, resource management and city building.

name: Alia's Carnival! Sacrament Plus
description: Alia’s Carnival! Sacrament Plus improved version of Alia’s Carnival! Sacrament for PS Vita from 2015, with the addition of the content released on PC with the fan fisk Flowering Sky.

name: Samurai Warriors 4 DX
description: The sparks of destiny ignite in this rich depiction of the Warring States period that features a total of 55 different officers. The deluxe edition contains more than 150 previously released DLC from "SAMURAI WARRIORS 4," including costumes, weapons, customization parts, scenarios, and BGM!

name: Space Captain McCallery Episode 2: Pilgrims in Purple Moss
description: Space Pirate Captain McCallery explores a mysterious ruin in an alien swamp in search of treasure in this Low-Poly 3D Action-Adventure game.

name: Blade Arcus Rebellion from Shining
description: A fighting game that features characters from Shining series and Sonia from Shining Resonance Refrain. Includes character skills, a growth element that allows you to unlock skills through acquiring points in battle and online mode.

name: Destruction
description: This is an ACT game developed by Indie team. Casual, simple but challenge. Exploring your spontaneous response, in addition, challenging your team’s ability to complete every different battle field’s mission.

name: Destiny Connect: Tick-Tock Travelers
description:
The town of Clocknee is celebrating the advent of a new millenium when time suddenly comes to a halt and a horde of hostile animated machines appears. It's up to a young girl named Sherry, her friend Pegreo, and Isaac, the time-traveling robot, to unravel the mystery behind the strange events. Together, they'll revisit the past and peer into the future, learning some very interesting things about their families and their peculiar town.

To you, who was once a child, and you, who will one day find someone precious.
Destiny Connect is a completely new RPG in development at Nippon Ichi Software.
